## 1. Load Packages and Data

```{r load_packages}
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
library(here)
library(tigris)
library(sf)
library(devtools)
library(cowplot)
library(ggthemes)
library(ggsflabel)
library(glue)

devtools::load_all()
```

```{r get_data}
congressional_votes_total <- get_congressional_vote_data()
```

## 2. Visualizing House Results from 1976 to 2020 by States

```{r fig.height = 27, fig.width = 10}
plots_two_party_spreads(congressional_votes_total, 'West Virginia')
```

```{r fig.height = 7, fig.width = 9}
plot_vote_shares(congressional_votes_total, 'Ohio')
```
